advice1.title: What data can be edited?
advice1.description: For strict security reasons and to protect your data at Internxt we do not allow the data of a user account such as email to be modified.

advice2.title: Security account
advice2.description: Your files are encrypted before leaving your device, so only you can access your files, no tricks, no hidden things, just privacy, that’s Internxt.

advice2.title: What should you keep in mind so that your password is secure?

advice3.title: New encryption key
advice3.description: By changing your password, all your files will be un-encrypted with your old password, and then re-encrypted using your new password, and thus you won't lose access to them! This action cannot be undone.

changePassword.title: Change password

2FA.title: Two-factor authentication (2FA)
2FA.description: Two-factor authentication provides an extra layer of security by requiring an additional verification when logging in. In addition to your Internxt password, you will also need a unique generated code sent to the email you used to register your account.

download.title: Download Authy
download.description: We recommend using Authy, but you can setup the 2FA process with any other 2FA of your choice.

backupKey.title: Backup key
backupKey.description: If you forget your password, you may use a unique backup key to recover your account. Never share this code with anyone.
backupKey.error: We could not generate your backup key

faq1.title: Why do I lose all my files if I forget my password?
faq1.description:
Your password is the only way to access your account. The Internxt team has absolutely no access to your account and is therefore unable to change your password. This is done to prevent any unauthorized access to your account and personal information.

You may restore your account without your password if you have created a backup key. You can export a copy of your unique backup key by visiting the “Security” tab in “Settings.” Your backup key may be used to recover your account by selecting “Forget password” at login and following the instructions in the subsequent email.

faq2.title: How can I keep my credentials safe?
faq2.description: We recommend you use a reputable password manager to store your password. Not just to store your credential for Internxt, but to also keep your other online accounts safe as well.

faq3.title: Can I recover my account with a backup key?
faq3.description: If you still have access to your unique encryption key, you can recover your data without your password. To do so, please follow the steps outlined in the email you will receive by clicking “Forgot password.”

faq4.title: Do I lose all my files if I change my password?
faq4.description: No. Since you are already logged into your account, you can change your password without losing anything. Be sure to choose a strong password that has not been found in any data breach.
